name: Babyjournal
0:
”Alexa ask baby journal to log a poo”
”Alexa ask baby journal how many wees”
”Alexa ask baby journal when was the last feed”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baby journal
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Log and retrieve your baby's activities hands free!

To start the skill, you can say:
- Alexa, open Baby journal

Alexa will then ask you what do you want to log, to which you can reply:

- Poo
- Wee
- Feed

You can also ask Alexa when was the last time your baby did one of those things:
- When was the last feed?
- When was the last poo?
- When was the last wee?

Or, ask how many did you log in the last 24 hours:
- How many poos in the last 24 hours?
- How many wees in the last 24 hours?
- How many feeds in the last 24 hours?

If Alexa makes a mistake and logs the wrong action, you can remove the previous entry with:
- Delete the previous entry

You can get all the data you have logged sent to you via email. Say:
- Send me my data

To do that, you'll have to link your Amazon account to Baby Journal. If you haven't done it yet, saying "send me my data" will prompt a link card in your mobile phone's Alexa app. 
You can also link your account in the skill web page for Baby Journal in Alexa's web site.
